data.message: I wish there was a way I could speak to you directly, Realistically, you are a very busy man I have so many things I would love to ask you, You are an idol to some, a god to others, But to me, you are way more than the way most people see you. You are a man like any other, who came from nothing and stopped at nothing to show the world that there is nothing that cannot be accomplished. You are an inspiration. It would be one of the biggest honors possible to be able to speak to Marshall. Person to person, as well as artist to artist.
